Articles.Content:
So, after cleaning out my computer I find myself in a bit of a conundrum. Since I am having trouble retrieving all the mods I had put up on my Google Drive (Stupid me)

So this leads to my question: What are some community "Must Have Mods"?

Here's an idea of what I'm looking for:

  • More command pods (Can't get enough of them)
  • Probe parts
  • More Engines
  • Spaceplane parts than can carry 1.25m satellites
  • Beautification

I can't say what are community "Must Have Mods" are but here are some of mine:

More command pods: Tantares and Taurus

Probe parts: DMagic Orbital Science

More Engines: RLA Stockalike

Spaceplane parts than can carry 1.25m satellites: Spaceplane+

Beautification: EVE
For Probe parts might look at BoxSat http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91616-0-24-2-BoxSat-vA-02a-Updated-Again-09-01-14

All of my "must have mods" are utilities, not part packs.

RCS Build Aid, Kerbal Flight Data, Kerbal Flight Indicators, Kerbal Alarm Clock, Part Angle Display, Enhanced Navball, etc.

Plus, of course, FAR, DR and EVE. Gotta have clouds.

Spaceplane Plus is the king of the part packs, though. No clutter, no cheesy SF nonsense, just a curated boutique selection of gorgeous and functional spaceplane bits that also make some fine vertical rockets if you're creative in your construction. The cargo bays can handle 1.25m parts so long as you don't tack on too much radially mounted clutter.

"Must have" is relative depending on your play style.

If you like to build things in orbit, RCS Build aid and Docking Port Alighnment Indicator.

If you like knowing all your information on one screen Kerbal Engineer.

If you like not having to do the same thing over and over again, MechJeb.

If you like building planes, Firespitter & KAX.

If you like building Spaceplanes, Spaceplane+ & B9.

If you like....

ok, I could go on forever here but really you just need to go to the Addon Releases forum and click the sticky at the top of the page and filter through all the addons to find the ones YOU like.
